newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 30.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 30.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi Arabia has spent 36 billion riyals on social insurance in past years, the labour minister says.
- Work is to start next month on a new 2,400 megawatt power plant for the Saudi Consolidated Electric Company - East.
- There are 24,000 foreigners working in plants in the Saudi industrial city of Jubail compared with 7,000 Saudis.
